Tab1Text1:
EasyGoinGamers is a fun loving community, with simplistic rules.
1) Respect others.
2) Respect the server.
3) Have fun!

Violations of these rules can vary widely in severity. Intentional maliciousness will not be tolerated. This isnt a free pass to abuse and exploit the server (see rule 2). Gentlemans agreements will be enforced within reason (see rule 1).
Tab2Text1:
A new community, our website is https://www.easygoingaming.com - join us on Discord: https://discord.gg/GGtejcq7wz
This server is a growing project, and is consistently updated and worked on. We aim to create the best Ark Survival Evolved gaming experience.
Tab2Text2: This Cluster hosts the Omega mod at its core, a deeply complex mod that creates an almost RPG-like experience within the Ark environment. We are building upon this mod to create a deeply involved endgame experience, complete with events, challenges, and unique features.
Tab4Text1: Exciting events and challenges coming! Join us on Discord to make suggestions or hear spoilers as they come.
